title: Recipe Recommender
description: A website made with Django that uses a Content-Based Filtering recommendation system to recommend users recipes they may like based off of recipes they have liked.

title: Sales Forecasting Kaggle Competition
description: Kaggle competition in which synthetic data is used to forecast the sale of four different books across six different countries and two different stores. I developed a LGBM model which scored a SMAPE value of 5.85, placing me in the top 25% out of 1381 competitors.

title: Personal Website
description: My own personal website which I made using Django for the backend and React for the frontend. The website also includes an AI Assistant which I made by using Retrieval-Augmented Generation on various documents about me which are fed to an OpenAI API.

title: Manufacuring Control Prediction Kaggle Competition
description: A Kaggle competition which involved predicting whether a machine is in state 0 or 1. I developed a sequential neural network model using Keras which allowed me to get an under the ROC curve of 0.997, placing me in the top 25% for this competition.
